title: Ethnicity distribution of acting winners at the Academy Awards 1928 to 2015
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 2 different Awards on X-axis for 2 groups White, and Other Ethnicities. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Award Best Actress had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 2 groups, and it was for White. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in Award Best Actress for Other Ethnicities.
Among all the Awards, White had the highest SOME LABEL in Award Best Actress and lowest SOME LABEL in Award Best Actor.
The maximum SOME LABEL for White that was found in Award Best Actress was 1.06 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Award Best Actor.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 2 different Awards for 2 groups White, and Other Ethnicities that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, White had the highest SOME LABEL in Award Best Actress and Other Ethnicities had the lowest SOME LABEL in Award Best Actress.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 2 different Awards on X-axis for 2 groups White, and Other Ethnicities. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Award Best Actress had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 2 groups, and it was for White. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in Award Best Actress for Other Ethnicities.
Among all the Awards, White had the highest SOME LABEL in Award Best Actress and lowest SOME LABEL in Award Best Actor.
The maximum SOME LABEL for White that was found in Award Best Actress was 1.06 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Award Best Actor.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 2 different Awards for 2 groups White, and Other Ethnicities that are presented on the X-axis.
In Award Best Actress, White had the highest SOME LABEL 989.0 among the 2 groups and in Best Actress, Other Ethnicities had the lowest SOME LABEL 11.0.
Among all the Awards, White had the highest SOME LABEL 989.0 in Award Best Actress and lowest value 932.0 in Award Best Actor.
The maximum SOME LABEL for White that was found in Award Best Actress was 1.06 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Award Best Actor.
Among all 2 groups, White had the gap of 57.0 between the maximum and minimum SOME LABEL observed in Award Best Actress and Best Actor respectively.
Averaging all 2 groups White, and Other Ethnicities, the Award Best Actor is the maximum SOME LABEL and Best Actress is the minimum SOME LABEL.
